mapper.insert: insert into room values(default, #{vo.mid}, #{vo.hotelIdx}, #{vo.name}, #{vo.roomNumber}, #{vo.price}, #{vo.maxPeople}, #{vo.petSizeLimit}, #{vo.petCountLimit}, #{vo.thumbnail}, #{vo.images}, default, default);
mapper.select: select * from room where hotelidx = #{idx} and maxpeople >= #{guestCount} and petcountlimit >= #{petCount} and status = '정상' and idx not in (select roomidx from reservation where status in ('대기중', '예약완료') and (checkinDate < #{checkoutDate} and checkoutDate > #{checkinDate})) order by name desc;
select * from options where idx in (select optionIdx from roomOptions where roomIdx = ${roomIdx});
mapper.update: update room set images = #{images} where idx = #{idx};
update room set images = null where idx = #{idx};
update room set thumbnail = #{vo.thumbnail}, images = #{vo.images} where idx = #{vo.idx};
update room set status = #{status} where idx = #{idx};
